message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your product is of interest, I'm currently working with a budget of $1,000,000.  Would you be open to discussing a price closer to that figure?
